body:
welcome to the avilove  2014 thread!


what's the purpose of this?
well you know.... as you can see valentines day was way back before and many here are being partnered up
and some are being cheesy enough that reveals it but the purpose of this is bringing up some people here who got the cheesiest "love story" and also who's the best partner of a certain player (example: player and player) which is you can post about their story and their good times together xD (i call it the awkward moments) also whose crush is this. (i've seen a lot of "lovers" recently tbh)

what are the rules?
1. you can tease them but not too much
2. don't spam too much
3. don't post their "love story" if they don't want to
4. keep this on topic!

somebody requested me to post this....

oh btw, have fun and don't take it so far pls! (if you know what i mean)
